for

Put in your headphones, select a soundscape, and follow a calming voice as it guides you to focus on different sounds. And with looping soundscapes and randomized instructions every play is different, ensuring each listen is just as effective as the first.

Real-world sounds, unique sessions

Unlike most ATT tracks, Metattune simulates real environments. And with randomized verbal cues, your practice is just as effective as the first time, every time.
